titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Turnabout [sound recording] : a satirical revue / [words and music by Forman Brown].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Turnabout [sound recording] : a satirical revue / [words and music by Forman Brown].

odd.head: Date/Time and Place of Event
odd.p: Recorded at Thee Studio, Claremont, California, August 17 and 22, September 14 and 28, 1975.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Los Angeles, Calif. : Pelican Records, p1975.

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Turnabout Players, with Elsa Lanchester; principally with the composer at the piano.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Turnabout -- Mrs. Pettibone's chandelier -- If you can't get in the corners -- Claribel the great -- Incident in Arch Street -- Mein Herz --Brunnhilde rides again -- March of rhyme -- Catalogue woman -- Victory garden.--The Doge's dilemma -- The last show -- When a lady has a piazza --Finale.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Selections from the revue at the Turnabout Theatre in Hollywood, which ran between 1941 and 1956; words by the composer.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Program notes by S. Jabloner on container.
